name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 012
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. There’s 5G In My Vaccine. Can we just all admit this theory is batshit insane? Like I understand peoples apprehension with new medicines, especially within the black community who have a history of being  experimented on, but at a certain point we have to call out the lunacy of certain people. It’s dangerous to society, and the more stuff like this spreads the more damage it does.
